comment: Shes worth million and has no job. And I'm supposed to feel bad for her why? Full time job, work a lot, and I might be able to scrape enough together to take a trip to my back yard for a vacation - yet she's drowning in money and muslims are pouring across our border getting handed k a month in benefits and cash. Boo fn hoo.
